title: Development and Construction : Except as hereinafter otherwise provided, these regulations shall apply to all development, redevelopment, erection and / or re-erection of a building, change of user etc
clause_text: Development and Construction : Except as hereinafter otherwise provided, these regulations shall apply to all development, redevelopment, erection and / or re-erection of a building, change of user etc. as well as to the design, construction or reconstruction, additions and alterations to a building.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
